name: Super Keegan
description:
IMPORTANT: GO FULL SCREEN or the CONTROLS wont work!
Help Super Keegan Collect Tokens
It should be noted that Keegan Hates Trees, but loves Tokens.

Use the left and right keys to control Keegan.
